text: Spravedlivost' v lyubvi k zhenshchinam, beskorystnaya milost' i vzaimnaya postoyannaya lyubov' ne vsegda vozmozhny. Takzhe ne vsegda vozmozhna odinakovaya lyubov' k zhonam, yesli u muzhchiny bol'she odnoy zheny. No nuzhno starat'sya byt' spravedlivym k kazhdoy i ne okazyvat' predpochteniya odnoy iz nikh, daby ne obidet' ni odnu iz nikh i ne postavit' yeyo v polozheniye nezhelannoy zheny i v to zhe vremya nerazvedonnoy zhenshchiny. Vam nuzhno byt' blagochestivymi i spravedlivymi i sozdavat' sem'yu na chistykh, dobrykh osnovakh. Yesli vy budete blagochestivymi i bogoboyaznennymi, Allakh prostit i poshchadit vas. Poistine, Allakh Vseproshchayushch, Miloserd
